name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boycott brands refusing to exit Russia

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now easily identify brands refusing to exit the Russian market and boycott their products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By refusing to exit the Russian market and continuing to pay their taxes there, some companies are implicitly supporting the war in Ukraine. This extension identifies their products while shopping online so you can boycott their products.

You can find the list of targeted companies here: https://github.com/petrussola/boycott-brands-supporting-war/blob/main/BOYCOTTED_BRANDS.md

Find the list of supported countries and supermarkets here: https://github.com/petrussola/boycott-brands-supporting-war/blob/main/SUPPORTED_SUPERMARKETS.md

Please provide feedback and, if you liked it, please consider rating it.
